name: MineSweeper (CarsynPeters)
description:
Just a MineSweeper game but in batch!

Still working on it though won't take long!

Version 1.1:

When the GameOver screen happens it will show where the mines were.

Version 1.2:

You are now able to win by making the  Non-Mine Counter 0 or you dug all the non-mine blocks. The same thing really.

Version 1.3:

You can pick to 2 fields, 15 blocks or 30 blocks. It will pick 8 times to different blocks on 15 blocks. It will pick 16 for 30 block field

Version 1.4:

Fixed problems for v1.3
